overview:
In his role as Vice President of Sales at hyperWALLET, Chris Silverson is responsible for the overall corporate sales and business development objectives, strategies and programs for the company.

With over 15 years of software business experience in the enterprise applications and technology sector, he has taken on progressively more senior sales management roles throughout his career.

His business success ranges from bringing start-up technology companies to market, as well as senior account management responsibilities with Fortune 500 companies including ADP Canada and Oracle Corporation.

Chris holds a Bachelor’s degree from Carleton University in Ottawa, and a Diploma of Marketing Management from the British Columbia Institute of Technology in Vancouver.
